source:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_00<tab>A reporter from the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> is eager to speak with you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ウルダハのミスリルアイの記者は、冒険者に聞きたいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_01<tab>A reporter from the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> stops you by saying he would like to ask you a few questions for an article he will be running on Little Ladies' Day. He begins by inquiring if you have ever heard of the trio of preteen troubadours, the Songbirds, who are scheduled to perform at the festival. As he continues to question you, however, it soon becomes evident that the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> representative's intentions are not quite what he claims them to be. Telling you an ardent group of the Songbirds' fans─the Birdwatchers─have been stirring up some trouble, he then attempts to recruit you on behalf of the royal seneschal who seems to have found himself on the receiving end of their mischief. While unable to tell you much more, the reporter then points you in the direction of Emerald Avenue where the Birdwatchers are gathered.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ミスリルアイの記者と話した。彼は、信頼できる冒険者を探しているという執事王の呼びかけに、志願するつもりがあるかどうか聞きたかったようだ。ウルダハのエメラルドアベニューにいる「執事王」から、起きているトラブルについて詳しい話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_02<tab>You approach the royal seneschal, who is being bombarded with bitter words and complaints, as devoted admirers of the Songbirds demand to know where the girls are. He is quick to pick you out from the rest of the angry mob and motions in your direction. Immensely relieved that backup has arrived, he asks that you meet him at the Wellhead Lift so that you might exchange a few words in private.
target: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_02<tab>執事王と話した。彼は、冒険者に折り入ってお願いしたいことがあるようだ。ウルダハのウェルヘッドリフト付近にいる「執事王」に話しかけ、内容について聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_03<tab>You meet with the royal seneschal near the Wellhead Lift. He tells you that what he is about to reveal is meant for your ears alone and would first have you swear to absolute secrecy before he says any more. Giving you a moment to think over whether you would wish to proceed or not, he asks that you inform him after you have made your decision.
target: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_SEQ_03<tab>執事王と再度話した。彼がお願いしたいことは、外部に情報が漏れると大変なことらしい。準備ができたら改めて執事王に話しかけ、詳細について聞くとしよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_000<tab>Pardon me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I'm a reporter with the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> covering this year's Little Ladies' Day. Might I trouble you with a few questions?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_000<tab>すみません！　少し話を伺わせていただけませんか？
実は私、経済誌「ミスリルアイ」の記者なのですが、
取材をさせていただきたく思っておりまして……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_001<tab>Excellent! Now, lest the throngs of excited folk haven't already given it away, three special little ladies are due to grace the stage shortly.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_001<tab>ありがとうございます！
では、さっそくですが質問を……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_002<tab>I speak, of course, of the Songbirds─the talented trio of preteen troubadours that took Ul'dah by storm last year.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_002<tab>ウルダハは現在、すべての女の子のための祝祭……
「プリンセスデー」の真っ只中なのは、
言わずもがな、把握されているかと思います。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_003<tab>Ever since their debut, their popularity has skyrocketed and shows no sign of slowing. Which brings me to my first question: you know them, of course?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_003<tab>さて、まず最初の質問です。
前回の「プリンセスデー」で登場して、
一躍人気となった「三歌姫」をご存知ですか？

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_Q1_000_000<tab>Do you know of the Songbirds?

TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_004<tab>Indeed, it'd be a wonder if you didn't. Now, as I mentioned, the three are scheduled to perform soon...though not soon enough for their legion of devoted fans─the Birdwatchers.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_004<tab>おぉ、やはりご存知でしたか！
突如登場して、あれだけ騒ぎになっていれば気付きますよね！
それでは、次の質問を……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_005<tab>Truly? The names Ulala, Masha, and Narumi do not ring a bell?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_005<tab>あら……ご存知ありませんでしたか！
ウララ、マシャ・マカラッカ、ナルミの3人の歌姫が、
前回の「プリンセスデー」から活動を始めたのですよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_006<tab>Ah, well, I suppose there's bound to be the odd person. At any rate, as I mentioned, the three are scheduled to perform soon...though not soon enough for their legion of devoted fans─the Birdwatchers.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_006<tab>売れっ子になること間違い無しですから、
覚えておいたほうがいいですよ！
それでは、次の質問を……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_007<tab>Which brings me to my next question. I'm informed that the royal seneschal, the man in charge of Little Ladies' Day, is experiencing difficulties and has urgent need of help from a capable─and discreet─adventurer.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_007<tab>「三歌姫」の公演を取り仕切っている「執事王」さんが、
信頼できる冒険者を探しているという情報があります。
何やらトラブルが起きているようなのです……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_008<tab>While I know not the exact nature of the request, I daresay it pertains to the waiting fans, who grow louder and ruder by the minute. What say you? Would you be willing to aid the poor man?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_008<tab>ズバリ、お聞きしますが……
冒険者さんは、志願するおつもりはありますか？

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_009<tab>The lack of details gives you pause, and I don't blame you. At the very least, though, I thought you might overlook it for the chance to get close to our starlets.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_009<tab>……あ、あれ？
あの「三歌姫」にお近づきになれるチャンスだから、
てっきり食いついてくるかと思いまして……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_010<tab>Well, it's your decision. But should you be inclined to lend a hand, the royal seneschal can be found by the stage on Emerald Avenue.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_010<tab>気になるようでしたら、
「執事王」さんに直接、話を聞いてみるといいですよ。
彼なら「エメラルドアベニュー」にいますから。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_011<tab>Just don't be too long in the deciding, however. I fear he won't hold up for much longer.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_011<tab>とは言え、あの調子では、
話しかけるのも一苦労かもしれませんが……。
ともかく、ご協力感謝いたします！

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_012<tab>Oh, and one last thing─do be careful when passing through Emerald Avenue. If you aren't, you may find yourself swept into a tide of hysterical fans with no way out, just as the royal seneschal was!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_REPORTER02399_000_012<tab>気になるようでしたら、
「執事王」さんに直接、話を聞いてみるといいですよ。
彼なら「エメラルドアベニュー」にいますから。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_GIRLA02399_000_020<tab>This is an outrage! We've been waiting for <var 1A 02 /var>hours<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_GIRLA02399_000_020<tab>えぇ～！
歌ひめのおねえちゃんたち、まだきてないのー！？

TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_GIRLB02399_000_021<tab>ずっと待ってるのにー！
早くしてよー！！

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_022<tab>L-Ladies and gentlemen, p-please settle down! The Songbirds are currently preparing and will make their appearance shortly. We ask that you wait just a little longer!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_022<tab>み、みなさん、落ち着いてください！
「三歌姫」も準備をしているところですので、
どうか今しばらくお待ちを……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_023<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that you!? Haha! My dear <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, you couldn't have come at a better time! As you can see, I am in desperate need of your help!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_023<tab>あなたは、以前に協力してくださった冒険者さんでは！？
ちょうどいいところに……よければ後ほど、
「ウェルヘッドリフト」そばに来ていただけますか？

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_024<tab>Y-You there! Y-Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my good adventurer! Are you the one who was sent to help me? You couldn't have come at a better time!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_024<tab>そ、そこのあなたは冒険者さんでは！？
ちょうどいいところに……よければ後ほど、
「ウェルヘッドリフト」そばに来ていただけますか？

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_025<tab>Please, come with me to the Wellhead Lift. I would speak of my plight in a private setting.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_025<tab>詳細はそのときにお話しいたしますので！
他に頼れる方がいないのです、どうかお願いいたします……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_030<tab>Thank the gods you came when you did! The Birdwatchers have been like that ever since we began stringing up decorations for Little Ladies' Day throughout the city.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_030<tab>来てくださってありがとうございます。
……ふぅ、それにしても大変でした。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_031<tab><sigh> If only I could say that was the worst of our problems... You see, while my staff and I labor to quell the unruly fans, we need someone to take on an even more urgent task─someone who is familiar with the city<var 1F /var>states and can travel swiftly between them.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_031<tab>お話ししたいことというのは他でもありません。
実は、冒険者さんに手伝っていただきたいことがあるのです。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_032<tab>Before I go on, however, I must ask that you keep our conversation in the utmost confidence. If the Birdwatchers were to learn of this, their angry words and raised fists would become pitchforks and torches!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_032<tab>……ただし、この話が万が一にも外部に漏れてしまうと、
さらに大変な騒ぎになりかねません！
他言無用、ここだけの話でお願いしたいのです。

source: TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_033<tab>It is a lot to take in, I understand, but pray do not take too long to consider. I can already hear the angry shouts growing louder!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY301_02399_BUTLER_000_033<tab>協力していただけるようでしたら、
改めて声をかけていただけますか？
詳細については、それからということで……。
